attributes.action: Remove police powers to retain DNA profile of innocent citizens.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Unique in any western democracy is the power of our police to retain DNA profiles of innocent people.
Anyone arrested for however minor a charge (including in some cases children)will remain on a police database for ever.Since the science of DNA is still in it's infancy we cannot tell if some future administration might not use this data for purposes that present society would consider unnaceptable.
Any innocent individual should have the right to have their DNA remove from these databases.
